channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Scoop: Gaza is fueling a growing push among Democrats for Palestinian statehood

item.title: Speaker Johnson to visit Israeli settlement in occupied West Bank
item.description: House Speaker Mike Johnson is expected to visit a settlement in the occupied West Bank on Monday as part of a private visit to Israel organized by a p...

item.title: Behind the Curtain: AI is shouldering the American economy
item.description: AI and its blood and oxygen — chips, data, energy — are producing an economic super-stimulant strong enough to prop up the entire country. Wall Street...

item.title: Electricity costs rise amid data center boom

item.description: For all their complaints about how unfair President Trump's tariffs are for U.S. automakers , the industry seems quite pleased with his environmental ...

item.title: Senate confirms Jeanine Pirro as top federal prosecutor for D.C.
ICE crackdown imperils Afghans who aided U.S. war effort, lawyers say
Live updates: Trump again claims jobs report revisions are a ‘scam’; Texas Democrats flee state to block map
item.description: Get the latest news on President Donald Trump’s second term and the Republican-led Congress.

item.title: Analysis: After 47 years on the political beat for The Post, it’s transition time
Texas Democrats flee state in effort to block GOP’s House map overhaul
item.description: By leaving, Democratic state legislators can stall a Republican plan that would give the GOP five more seats to protect their narrow House majority.

item.title: Former Trump statistics chief slams Friday firing of Erika McEntarfer
item.description: Bill Beach said the president's suggestions that the jobs report was rigged betrayed a misunderstanding in how those numbers are assembled.

item.title: Trump fires statistics chief after soft jobs report
item.description: The monthly jobs report showed just 73,000 jobs in July, with big reductions to May's and June's numbers

item.title: Trump is under water on some of his top issues — including immigration, poll shows
item.description: The president’s approval rating had been ticking upward since its biggest drop in April.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
